name: Enshrouded (itch)
description:
I made this game for Ludum Dare 50, the theme was "Delay the Inevitiable". It took around 3 days to make this game, for the first day I had no idea what I was going to do, originally I was going to make something where you have batteries and you need to find more power but midway though stressing over that idea I said to myself "what if instead of a battery use a fire and you add wood to it..." and from that point on I knew exactly what I was making.
